description: Practice questions organized by level and category

vocabulary.question: What does 'फेरि भेटौंला' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: फेरि भेटौंला means See you again

vocabulary.question: What does 'कस्तो छ?' mean?
vocabulary.explanation: कस्तो छ? means How are you?

grammar.question: Which ending is for first person singular present tense?
grammar.explanation: छु is used with 'म' (I) in present tense: म खान्छु (I eat)

grammar.question: What is the past tense ending for 'I went'?
grammar.explanation: म गएँ (I went) - एँ is used for first person singular past tense

grammar.question: Which question word means 'what'?
grammar.explanation: के means 'what' - तपाईंको नाम के हो? (What is your name?)

grammar.question: What is the negative of 'म जान्छु'?
grammar.explanation: जान्दिनँ is the negative present tense form

grammar.question: Which postposition means 'in/at'?
grammar.explanation: मा indicates location - म घरमा छु (I am at home)

grammar.question: How do you form the continuous tense in Nepali?
grammar.explanation: म पढ्दैछु (I am reading) - दै shows ongoing action

grammar.question: What is 'I will go' in Nepali?
grammar.explanation: नेछु ending indicates future tense

grammar.question: Which is the polite imperative form of 'sit'?
grammar.explanation: नुहोस् is the polite command form - यहाँ बस्नुहोस् (Please sit here)

grammar.question: What does 'म किताब पढ्दैछु' mean?
grammar.explanation: पढ्दैछु is continuous tense - action happening now

grammar.question: Which ending shows future tense for 'he/she'?
grammar.explanation: ऊ जानेछ (He/She will go) - नेछ for third person singular

grammar.question: How do you form conditional sentences in Nepali?
grammar.explanation: यदि तपाईं आउनुभयो भने राम्रो हुन्छ (If you come, it will be good)

grammar.question: What is the passive voice ending in Nepali?
grammar.explanation: घर बनाइयो (The house was built) - इयो shows passive past

grammar.question: What does 'भने' indicate in a sentence?
grammar.explanation: यदि पानी पर्यो भने म जान्दिनँ (If it rains, I won't go)

grammar.question: When is passive voice used?
options: When the agent is unknown or unimportant
grammar.correctAnswer: When the agent is unknown or unimportant
grammar.explanation: यो काम गरियो (This work was done) - focus on action, not doer

grammar.question: What is a causative verb in Nepali?
options: A verb that makes someone do something
grammar.correctAnswer: A verb that makes someone do something
grammar.explanation: गराउनु (to make do), खुवाउनु (to feed someone)

grammar.question: How do you form reported speech in Nepali?
grammar.explanation: उहाँले भन्नुभयो कि उहाँ भोलि आउनुहुन्छ (He said he will come tomorrow)

grammar.question: What does 'मैले काम गराएँ' mean?
grammar.explanation: गराउनु is causative - causing someone else to do the action

grammar.question: What does 'कि' indicate in reported speech?
grammar.explanation: उनले भने कि... (He said that...)

grammar.question: What characterizes literary Nepali?
grammar.explanation: त्यस बेला राजाले शासन गर्थे (At that time, the king ruled)

grammar.question: What is the structure 'जब...तब' used for?
grammar.explanation: जब म साना थिएँ, तब म खेल्न मन पराउँथें (When I was small, I liked playing)

grammar.question: What does 'जसरी...त्यसरी' express?
grammar.explanation: जसरी तपाईं भन्नुहुन्छ, त्यसरी गर्छु (As you say, so I will do)

grammar.question: In formal writing, which verb form is preferred?
grammar.explanation: गर्दछ → गर्छ, भएको → भयो in formal/literary contexts
